Home / Donate

WeCare-Ng started it's first Project in Isheri, Ogun State named WeCare-Ng_Isheri as a multi-healthcare services facility with primary focus on Mothers and babies. The need to provide safe and effective delivery of healthcare services to pregnancy women in Africa has been properly documented, we want to work with local communities to fill the gap in the healthcare space.

We'll be using several tools such as building clinics, renovating clinics, supplying medical equipment, providing staff and training support staffs, resourcing mental health providers and other services. We have partners like Project C.U.R.E and KeyBank on our side, we are deploying a all hands on deck attitude towards the greater goods.

You are also part of the team and we count on your leadership, resources, knowledge, and support to move this project to the next level. Your generosity can help us do more to procure medical equipment and supplies needed to start outfitting several health centers, medical pavilion, and clinics.

Partner With Us

As a community healthcare center our mission is to provide care for all irrespective of the their financial capacity. We at WeCare-Ng we partner with other organizations in different ways. We appreciate your generosity and contributions to any of our on-going projects. We also welcome additional opportunity to expand services into other areas of societal needs.

Is a community healthcare center our mission is to provide care for all irrespective of the their financial capacity.
